announcements.title: Version 1.0.11: Improved Top Bar! üé®
announcements.message: We've redesigned the top bar for a better experience! The app bar is now fixed to the top edge (no more floating), giving you more screen space and better visual hierarchy. We've also simplified the design with a clean, flat look. Plus, we fixed the file rename feature - tap the filename to rename your documents!

announcements.title: Welcome to Owl.md! ü¶â
announcements.message: Thank you for choosing Owl.md - your markdown to PDF converter! We're excited to help you create beautiful PDFs from markdown. This notification center will show you helpful tips and important updates. Let's get started!

announcements.title: Quick Start: Create Your First PDF
announcements.message: Creating a PDF is easy! Type or paste your markdown in the editor ‚Üí Tap 'Preview' to see how it looks ‚Üí Tap 'Convert to PDF' ‚Üí Choose a theme ‚Üí Save or share your PDF. It's that simple!

announcements.title: Formatting Toolbar: Quick Access
announcements.message: Use the formatting toolbar at the bottom of the editor for quick access to: Bold (B), Italic (I), Headings (H), Checklists, Code blocks, Blockquotes, Bullet lists, and Numbered lists. Tap any button to insert the formatting!

announcements.title: PDF Themes: Choose Your Style
announcements.message: Owl.md offers 4 professional PDF themes: Professional (blue, corporate), Modern (amber, contemporary), Minimalist (gray, clean), and Classic (brown, traditional). Each theme is optimized for different document types!

announcements.title: File Management: Open & Save
announcements.message: Tap the folder icon (üìÅ) to open existing markdown files from your device. Use 'More Menu (‚ãÆ) ‚Üí Save As' to save your work. Your recent files are automatically saved in the file history!

announcements.title: Load from GitHub: Import from Public Repos
announcements.message: You can load markdown files directly from public GitHub repositories! Tap 'Quick Actions (‚ö°) ‚Üí Load from GitHub URL', paste any public GitHub markdown URL, and we'll fetch it for you. Note: Only works with public repos, not private ones!

announcements.title: Preview Mode: See Before Converting
announcements.message: Always check your document in Preview mode before converting to PDF! Switch between Edit and Preview tabs to see exactly how your markdown will look. What you see in preview is what you get in the PDF!

announcements.title: Callout Blocks: Highlight Important Info
announcements.message: Create eye-catching callout blocks in your PDFs! Use: ‚ö°TIP (tips), üìÑNOTE (notes), ‚ö†Ô∏èWARN (warnings), ‚ÑπÔ∏èINFO (information), ‚ùìQUES (questions), ‚úìSUCC (success), ‚õîDANG (danger), üìùEXAM (examples), üí¨QUOT (quotes), üìåCALL (callouts).

announcements.title: Tables: Organize Your Data
announcements.message:
Owl.md supports markdown tables! Create tables using pipes (|) and hyphens (-). Example:
| Header 1 | Header 2 |
|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   |
Tables render beautifully in all PDF themes!

announcements.title: Code Blocks: Share Your Code Beautifully
announcements.message:
Include code in your documents with proper formatting! Use triple backticks (```) for code blocks. Example:
```python
print('Hello World')
```
Code blocks are syntax-highlighted and properly formatted in PDFs!

announcements.title: Sharing: Send Your PDFs Anywhere
announcements.message: After converting to PDF, tap the share button to send your document via email, messaging apps, or save to cloud storage like Google Drive or Dropbox. Your PDFs are ready to share instantly!

announcements.title: Dark Mode: Reduce Eye Strain
announcements.message: Working at night? Enable dark mode by tapping the theme toggle icon in the top bar. Dark mode is designed to reduce eye strain and save battery on OLED screens!

announcements.title: Works Offline: No Internet Required
announcements.message: Owl.md works completely offline! Create, edit, preview, and convert PDFs without an internet connection. All your data stays on your device - we don't collect or send any personal information.

announcements.title: Privacy First: Your Data Stays Private
announcements.message: We take your privacy seriously! Owl.md doesn't collect any personal data, doesn't use analytics or tracking, and all your documents stay on your device. No cloud sync, no data sharing - just pure privacy!

announcements.title: Need Help? We're Here for You!
announcements.message: Have questions, found a bug, or want to request a feature? Tap 'More Menu (‚ãÆ)' and choose 'Report a Bug', 'Request a Feature', or 'Get Help'. You can also email us at support@injazapps.com anytime!

announcements.title: User Guide: Learn All Features
announcements.message: Want to learn more? Tap 'More Menu (‚ãÆ) ‚Üí User Guide' to access the complete user manual. It covers all features, tips, and tricks to help you get the most out of Owl.md!
